values.value: Provide a clear and conspicuous privacy notice to California consumers at or before the point of personal information collection. CCPA requires disclosure of the categories of data collected and the purposes for which it will be used.

Review all data collection points including web forms, APIs, and Salesforce Communities to ensure a privacy notice is displayed before data collection begins. The notice must list all categories of personal information collected and the specific business purposes for each category. Update the notice annually or whenever collection practices change. Link the privacy notice prominently on all customer-facing Salesforce Experience Cloud pages.
